articles.content: Petrol and diesel prices have remained unchanged for 68 days in a row despite a USD 16 swing in international oil prices and global rates again climbing to USD 84 per barrel, oil company data showed.… [+5041 chars]

articles.title: Amazon Great Republic Day Sale to Go Live Starting January 17: Deals, Discounts, Offers - Gadgets 360
articles.description: Amazon Great Republic Day Sale dates announced on Wednesday. The Amazon sale will begin from Monday, January 17. It will last until January 20 and offer deals, discounts, and offers a range of products.

articles.title: Easy Trip Planners announces bonus issue in the ratio of 1:1 - Mint
articles.description: Easy Trip Planners said bonus shares will be issued out of free reserves created out of profits of the company available as at March 31, 2021
articles.content: Easy Trip Planners on Wednesday announced that its board at its meeting today recommended issuing 1 bonus share for every 1 held i.e., in 1:1 ratio, which is subject to shareholders approval. The com… [+131 chars]

articles.title: Komaki Venice high-speed electric scooter revealed - HT Auto
articles.description:
Komaki Venice electric scooter will be offered in nine different colour schemes.
The high-speed electric scooter comes with a battery pack of 72v40ah, ample seating space and an extra storage box.
articles.content: Electric vehicle manufacturer Komaki Electric Vehicles on Wednesday revealed its new high-speed electric scooter Venice. The electric scooter will be the fifth model in its high-speed portfolio in th… [+1852 chars]
